dcterms:creator: Anuradha M Annaswamy
Karl H Johansson
George J Pappas
dcterms:description: The stochastic harmonic oscillator (SHO) is a linear model that describes the position and velocity of an oscillating mass in a single dimension under random perturbations.
dcterms:title: Stochastic Harmonic Oscillator (SHO)

dcterms:creator: Richard S Sutton
dcterms:description: The acrobot is defined by two connected links, which is a non-linear environment that requires a non-linear controller to perform the swing up.
dcterms:title: Acrobot

dcterms:creator: Rita Antonelli
Alessandro Astolfi
dcterms:description: The continuous stirred tank reactor (CSTR) describes a chemical process following non-linear dynamics, where the temperature in the reactor has to be stabilised around a setpoint temperature.
dcterms:title: Continuous Stirred Tank Reactor (CSTR)
